meanings.definition: A Korean martial art that focuses on self-defense techniques.
meanings.sent1: She learned hapkidos to protect herself.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy practicing hapkidos for fitness and self-defense.
meanings.sent3: The hapkidos class was full of energetic students ready to learn.
meanings.sent4: In the world of martial arts, hapkidos shines as a versatile and effective discipline.
meanings.sent5: The swift movements of hapkidos make it a formidable martial art.

meanings.definition: The practice or study of hapkido.
meanings.sent1: His dedication to hapkidos training paid off in competitions.
meanings.sent2: The dojo offers classes for those interested in hapkidos.
meanings.sent3: Practicing hapkidos every day kept him fit and focused.
meanings.sent4: Her commitment to hapkidos was unwavering, leading to mastery.
meanings.sent5: The philosophy behind hapkidos emphasizes harmony and discipline.

meanings.sent1: The hapkidos instructor demonstrated a new technique.
meanings.sent2: She became a hapkidos expert after years of training.
meanings.sent3: The hapkidos master's skill was unmatched in the tournament.
meanings.sent4: He admired the dedication of the hapkidos black belt holders.
meanings.sent5: The hapkidos practitioner moved with grace and precision.
